actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

official_title: To amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to repeal the requirements both for additional cargo preference imposed on certain agricultural exports and for allocations of a share of such exports to Great Lakes ports.
short_title: Pro Competition Cargo Allocation Act of 1989

summary.text: Pro Competition Cargo Allocation Act of 1989 - Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 to repeal various provisions relating to cargo preference shipping requirements for certain agricultural exports, including provisions relating to preserving the percentage share or metric tonnage of certain commodities of waterborne cargoes exported from Great Lakes ports.

titles.title: Pro Competition Cargo Allocation Act of 1989

To amend the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to repeal the requirements both for additional cargo preference imposed on certain agricultural exports and for allocations of a share of such exports to Great Lakes ports.
